input-validation.heading: Please correct the errors on the page.
input-validation.required: Complete the required field to continue.
input-validation.date: Enter a valid date in mm/dd/yyyy format.
input-validation.file-size-too-large-all-files: Files exceed the 3.5 MB maximum. Upload smaller files.
input-validation.file-submission: There was a problem with the file submitted. Try uploading a different file format, such as PDF.
input-validation.all-checkboxes-required: Read and check all boxes to confirm the items in this section.
input-validation.validGovEmail: Enter a valid government email address.
input-validation.notSameAsUserEmail: This cannot be your email address. Enter the email of the person in charge of your team. Enter the email of the person in charge of your team. If that's you, add a colleague.

error-list.check-all: Check off all the boxes for: {{question}}

errorPanel.defaultMessage: Sorry, there was a problem and we lost you. Please try again later.

password.label: Password
password.hint: Must be at least 8 characters with a capital letter, number, and symbol

error.minLength: Password must be at least 8 characters.
error.oneLowerCase: Password must contain at least 1 lowercase character.
error.oneUpperCase: Password must contain at least 1 uppercase character.
error.oneNumber: Password must contain at least 1 number.
error.oneSymbol: Password must contain at least 1 symbol.

error.mustMatch: The entries for password must match.
